amendment.description: Amendment defines parameters and sets guidelines for the scope of "work" under section 408 review processes.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 114-790 to define parameters and sets guidelines for the scope of "work" under Section 408 review processes.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Babin amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Babin amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Babin.
